meanings.definition: A person or thing that is excellent or outstanding.
meanings.sent1: The new playground equipment is a real darb for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The painting by the artist was a true darb of creativity.
meanings.sent3: The cake was such a darb that it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a darb that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The darb of a sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To hit or strike with force.
meanings.sent1: He darbed the ball with all his might, sending it flying.
meanings.sent2: The hammer darbed the nail into the wood effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: She darbed the door closed in frustration.
meanings.sent4: The storm darbed the trees, bending them in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The boxer darbed his opponent with a powerful punch.

meanings.sent1: The new model darbs the previous one in terms of features.
meanings.sent2: Her performance darbs all others in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The student darbs his classmates in math skills.
meanings.sent4: The chef darbs herself by creating a unique dish.
meanings.sent5: The athlete darbs the record with an incredible time.
